text: You have killed my love_ You used to stir my imagination. Now you don't even stir my curiosity. You simply produce no effect. I loved you because were marvellous, because you had genius and intellect, because you realised the dreams of great poets and shape and substance to the shadows of art. You have thrown it all away: You are shallow and stupid.
